experiences.title: Game Systems Architect
experiences.description: Led the architecture team responsible for the forthcoming MetaVerse initiative. Conceptualized and executed an efficient architecture methodology utilizing Unity, specifically optimized for integration with the Data-Oriented Technology Stack (DOTS).

experiences.title: Senior Game Developer
experiences.description: Working on an ambitious multiverse MMO. Working on cross-platform web and VR. Designed and implemented networking infrastructure, matchmaking capabilities, and specialized backend systems required to support Massively Multiplayer Online (MMO) level game experiences. Develop systems to handle NFT data.

experiences.title: Game Programmer Lead
experiences.description: Leading a small team of developers and artists. Participating in game design and future planning. Developing serious games specialized in security awareness. VR/XR, web, mobile, and Kinect games. Building one platform with all the games on mobile.

experiences.title: Game Track Supervisor / Teaching Assistance
experiences.description: Curriculum Development and Instruction: Taught a diverse range of technical subjects, including C/C++, HTML5 game development, design patterns, Unity3D game engine, game optimization, and version control. Continuously updated and enhanced the intake curriculum to incorporate the latest industry technologies. Student Management and Support: Provided ongoing management and support to students throughout the learning process, including guidance on their final graduation projects.

experiences.title: Game Developer
experiences.description: Led the effort to rebuild el3ab.com's flash games for modern platforms (Web, Android, and iOS), utilizing both Unity3D and Phaser.js, resulting in two distinct game versions. Developed the server-side logic for multiplayer card and board games using JAVA and Smart Fox Server. Featured Project: Estimation Kings - published on iOS and Android.

experiences.title: Web Solution Developer
experiences.description: Developing SkyPM - Predefined Preventive Maintenance Software.
